p: The authors then used the particles to coat glass substrates and polyethylene terephthalate fabric to investigate the wetting properties of the F-SiNPs using water and dodecane. It was determined that the ability to control the ratio of fluorinated silane to N-(3-triethoxysilylpropyl)gluconamide allowed for the ability to tune the wettability of the resulting films from highly oleophobic/superhydrophobic to highly oleophobic/superhydrophilic.
